title: Impact of tourism on the landscape

content.question: Directions: You have 20 minutes to answer the following question. It is suggested that you take a few minutes of this time to plan and outline your answer. Illustrate your essay with substantive examples where appropriate. It is not enough to answer a question by merely listing facts. You should present a cogent argument based on your critical analysis of the questions posed and your understanding of geography. Identify and explain ONE way that tourism has diminished regional landscape distinctiveness. Identify and explain ONE way that tourism has enhanced regional landscape distinctiveness.

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain a likely outcome in a geographic scenario using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
